comments:
I20051101-0010

Happends when the selected variable's type does not resolve to a type in the 
Java model (i.e. source lookup does not resolve to a type in the Java model, 
but perhaps external source, or source lookup failed).

In my case, I was debugging with an alternate JRE that was on the source 
lookup path, but not the build path of the project.

Fixed in CurrentValueContext. We were not checking for a null return value 
when null was possible. The fix avoids the NPE, and the end (expected) result 
is that code assist only works when we can resolve a Java model element for 
the currently selected value.
